              <xsl:if test="/ns0:OTA_AirLowFareSearchRQ/ns0:TravelerInfoSummary/ns0:AirTravelerAvail/ns0:AirTraveler/ns0:CustLoyalty">
                <xsl:for-each select="/ns0:OTA_AirLowFareSearchRQ/ns0:TravelerInfoSummary/ns0:AirTravelerAvail/ns0:AirTraveler/ns0:CustLoyalty">
                  <xsl:for-each select=".">
                    <sws:CustLoyalty>
                      <xsl:if test="@ProgramID">
                        <xsl:attribute name="ProgramID">
                          <xsl:value-of select="@ProgramID"/>
                        </xsl:attribute>
                      </xsl:if>
                      <xsl:value-of select="."/>
                    </sws:CustLoyalty>
                  </xsl:for-each>
                </xsl:for-each>
              </xsl:if>
            </sws:AirExtras>
            <sws:Indicators>
              <sws:MinMaxStay>
                <xsl:attribute name="Ind">
                  <xsl:value-of select="/ns0:OTA_AirLowFareSearchRQ/ns0:TravelPreferences/ns0:FareRestrictPref/ns0:AdvResTicketing/@AdvResInd"/>
                </xsl:attribute>
              </sws:MinMaxStay>
            </sws:Indicators>
          </sws:MiscQualifiers>
          <sws:PricingQualifiers>
            <xsl:attribute name="CurrencyCode">
              <xsl:value-of select="/ns0:OTA_AirLowFareSearchRQ/ns0:TravelerInfoSummary/ns0:AirTravelerAvail/ns0:AirTraveler/@CurrencyCode"/>
            </xsl:attribute>
            <sws:PassengerType>
              <xsl:attribute name="Code">
                <xsl:value-of select="/ns0:OTA_AirLowFareSearchRQ/ns0:TravelerInfoSummary/ns0:AirTravelerAvail/ns0:AirTraveler/ns0:PassengerTypeQuantity/@Code"/>
              </xsl:attribute>
              <xsl:attribute name="Quantity">
                <xsl:value-of select="/ns0:OTA_AirLowFareSearchRQ/ns0:TravelerInfoSummary/ns0:AirTravelerAvail/ns0:AirTraveler/ns0:PassengerTypeQuantity/@Quantity"/>
              </xsl:attribute>
            </sws:PassengerType>
            <sws:Taxes>
              <xsl:attribute name="NoTax">
                <xsl:value-of select="/ns0:OTA_AirLowFareSearchRQ/ns0:TravelerInfoSummary/ns0:PriceRequestInformation/ns0:Tax/@TaxExemptInd"/>
              </xsl:attribute>
            </sws:Taxes>
          </sws:PricingQualifiers>
        </sws:OptionalQualifiers>
      </sws:PriceRequestInformation>
    </sws:OTA_AirLowFareSearchRQ>
  </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>
